name: MonsterHitDice
description: Automatically fills in the hit points for a characters dragged onto the table top.The default token for the character needs to represent that creature but **should not** have the bar used for hit points linked to an attribute.  Use the settings below to configure the script for how you calculate hit points in your game.  There are several sheets for which the configurations are built in or you can use the more detailed settings.  Details about each setting are included along with it.## Commands```!mhd```This will reroll hitpoints for all selected tokens.

useroptions.name: Bar
useroptions.description: Select the bar to use for hitpoints.

useroptions.name: Sheet
useroptions.description: Select the character sheet you are using to attempt to preconfigure for that sheet.

useroptions.name: HitDice Attribute
useroptions.description: Type the name of the attribute used to store the HitDice formula.

useroptions.name: SRD Embedded Formula
useroptions.description: Select this checkbox if the HitDice attribute has formula in the SRD embedded format '12 (3d4+5)'

useroptions.name: Separate Constitution Modifier
useroptions.description: Select this checkbox if you store the constitution modifier separately from the HitDice formula.

useroptions.name: Constitution Attribute
useroptions.description: Type the name of the attribute used to store the constitution value.

useroptions.name: Constitution is Stat
useroptions.description: Select this checkbox if the Constitution attribute should be converted to a modifier ((CON-10)/2).
